func.title: SetPicture

param.name: x
param.desc: X position of the top left corner of the new graphics rectangle.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y position of the top left corner of the new graphics rectangle.

param.name: width
param.desc: Width of the new graphics rectangle.

param.name: height
param.desc: Height of the new graphics rectangle.

func.desc: Changes the representative picture of the object by setting it to a new source rectangle within the definition graphics. This picture is used e.g. in menus or the inventory. Also see the Picture entry in DefCore.txt.

example.text: Global function: changes the picture of obj to that of another object (Warning: this may make the game graphics or SolidMasks of the object invalid).
